label: 節
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: seasonal rites celebrated by the court and concluded by royal banquets (sechi'e 節会) feting members of officialdom. Seven days yearly were designated for such rites in the Law on Miscellaneous Matters (Zōryō 雑令) of the ritsuryō codes. [律令]
